title: Student Virtual Mentor
description:
Navigating high school can be overwhelming. Running Start's Student Assistant is a virtual tutor, mentor, and school counselor. Get personalized guidance across self-discovery, academic planning, extracurricular exploration, & develop essential success skills. 
Ever feel stuck selecting courses or not sure which extracurricular activity could be a fit? Just chat with Student Assistant about your interests. It will research your school's course catalog and websites to provide you with insights.
